dn18:4.2: kho panāpi → tena kho panāpi (s1-3) | te kho panapi (pts1)
dn18:7.2: aṭṭhiṃ katvā → aṭṭhikatvā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), sabbaṃ cetasā → sabbaṃ cetaso (bj, s1-3, km) | sabbacetaso (pts1)
dn18:10.5: manussarājā bhavituṃ pahomi → so ito cuto manussesu rājā bhavituṃ pahomi (s1-3, km) | amanussarājā divi homi (pts1)
dn18:12.2: dibbaparisā → dibbā parisā (pts1), samantato nisinnā honti → sannisinnā honti (bj) | sannisinnā honti sannipatitā (mr)
dn18:20.1: pallaṅkena → pac­ce­ka­pallaṅ­kesu pac­ce­ka­pallaṅ­kena (sī1, ka-ma), pac­ce­ka­pallaṅke (syā1-3, kaṃ)
